subject: Products catalog amd prices for reseller
description_text:
Hello, 

I'm Adham from V8 Racing Center in Lebanon
You contacted me earlier for your new products.
and I am interested in few of them.
Can you share with me the updated products catalog with the prices for resellers?
and your WhatsApp number so I can ask for some details.

Kind regards
Adham Ghannam
V8 s.a.r.l

Sent from my iPhone
